record.title: PERMISSION TO CONSIDER AS ADOPTED MOTIONS TO SUSPEND THE RULES
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO CONSIDER AS ADOPTED MOTIONS TO SUSPEND THE RULES -- (House of Representatives - September 17, 2008)

[Page: H8368]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the motions to suspend the rules relating to the following measures be considered as adopted in the form considered by the House on Monday, September 15, 2008:

House Resolution 1255, House Resolution 1372, House Resolution 1425, House Concurrent Resolution 410, H.R. 2352, H.R. 2535, H.R. 3437, H.R. 5293, H.R. 5350, H.R. 5736, H.R. 6064, H.R. 6503, and H.R. 6855.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
Without objection, respective motions to reconsider are laid on the table and titles are amended as applicable.
